content.question: According to the table, which item saw the greatest proportional increase in value of imports from 1699 to 1774, and which item saw the greatest proportional decrease in value of imports from 1699 to 1774 ?

choices.label: Tea saw the greatest proportional increase, and silks and mixed fabrics saw the greatest proportional decrease.
Sugar saw the greatest proportional increase, and silks and mixed fabrics saw the greatest proportional decrease.
Tea saw the greatest proportional increase, and pepper saw the greatest proportional decrease.
Tobacco saw the greatest proportional increase, and pepper saw the greatest proportional decrease.

content.answer: Tea saw the greatest proportional increase, and pepper saw the greatest proportional decrease.

unit.text: 5: Conflict, Crisis, and Reaction in the Late 18th Century

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Identify patterns among or connections between historical developments and processes.
